mapper.insert: insert into bora_cmnt_board (id, b_ctgr, b_title, b_content, b_file) values (#{id}, #{b_ctgr}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_file})
mapper.select: select * from bora_cmnt_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc
